tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE legislators (
    legislator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    contact_email VARCHAR(255),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(15),
    party_affiliation VARCHAR(50),
    district_number INT,
    voting_record JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE legislators (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name TEXT,
  last_name TEXT,
  email TEXT,
  phone_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE legislators (
  legislator_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  party VARCHAR(50),
  state VARCHAR(50),
  district INTEGER,
  contact_number VARCHAR(20),
  email VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE voting_records (
  record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  legislator_id UUID,
  vote_date DATE,
  bill_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  vote_result BOOLEAN,
  FOREIGN KEY (legislator_id) REFERENCES legislators(legislator_id)
);

CREATE TABLE contact_history (
  history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  legislator_id UUID,
  contact_date TIMESTAMP,
  contact_type VARCHAR(50),
  contact_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (legislator_id) REFERENCES legislators(legislator_id)
);

CREATE TABLE advocacy_actions (
  action_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  target_id UUID,
  action_date TIMESTAMP,
  action_type VARCHAR(50),
  action_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (target_id) REFERENCES advocacy_targets(target_id)
);
